in

have the opportunity to mat hin

As de Chinese Studenti 
Conference to be convented at 
Martford, is approaching, and as 
dam a little need of money 
now, I beg to request you de seul 
me a check of fifty dollara ora 
al your earliert conveniencl. 
s shall be ever to obliged if 
you will confer me dis riquet 
Best wishes.

Yours truly 
I S. Selwan

August 18, 1910
raw: in  have the opportunity to mat hin  As de Chinese Studenti  Conference to be convented at  Martford, is approaching, and as  dam a little need of money  now, I beg to request you de seul  me a check of fifty dollara ora  al your earliert conveniencl.  s shall be ever to obliged if  you will confer me dis riquet  Best wishes.  Yours truly  I S. Selwan  August 18, 1910

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that Kwan has been in Hartford since July 1. He states that his father is to visit with Prince Tsai Hsun, the Naval Commissioner and they will arrive in San Francisco on September 16th. He hopes Stearns will meet his father then. He requests $50 for the Chinese students' conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
